question: You are having a graduation party next Sunday evening. You have invited over 25 people to celebrate in your garden, which may continue late in to the night. Write a letter to your elderly neighbour. In your letter: Explain what will be happening, offer him your apologies in advance, invite him to join the celebration
text: I hope you and your family are great. I am writing to tell you that I am organizing a party for the completion of my degree and I would greatly appreciate  it if you could join us for this lovely moment.

The first thing I would like to share with you about this special event is that I was doing master's in computer science which is a tough course but I passed this with good marks. Therefore, next Sunday my friends want to celebrate this achievement at my home in which we have a BBQ party in the backyard and have a movie planned for Sunday night in my home.

I am sorry for the small notice and for letting  you down like this. I can understand this is probably quite annoying for you since on weekend evenings I know you like to do yoga and enjoy your holiday peacefully. I want to say sorry in advance for this substantial inconvenience.
I would be thankful if you could join us. You always motivated me when I was feeling sad while studying. Thus, I am really excited to celebrate with you.
I am looking forward to hearing from you.
